articles.author: Amy Tennery
articles.title: Olympics-Athletics-American McLaughlin breaks world record to win women's 400 hurdles - The Star Online
articles.description: TOKYO (Reuters) -     Sydney McLaughlin shattered her own 400 metres hurdles world record to win gold in 51.46 seconds on Wednesday, getting the better of fellow American Dalilah Muhammad in a thrilling Tokyo Olympics final that lived up to all expectations.
articles.content: TOKYO (Reuters) - Sydney McLaughlin shattered her own 400 metres hurdles world record to win gold in 51.46 seconds on Wednesday, getting the better of fellow American Dalilah Muhammad in a thrilling … [+2061 chars]

articles.title: SA set to receive another batch of Pfizer vaccines - eNCA
articles.description: America donated 5.6 million doses as part of the Covax facility.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG - South Africa is set to receive another batch of Pfizer vaccines from the US on Tuesday.  
America donated 5.6 million doses as part of the Covax facility.

articles.title: 'It's emotional': ICU nurse describes life in the ER - ABC17News.com
articles.description: With new cases of Covid-19 surging in most of the US — driven by unvaccinated Americans and fueled by the highly contagious Delta variant — hospitals are bracing for another round of devastation.
articles.content:
